channel.title: [request]Willow Cutter and Dropper
channel.description: I need a Willow Cutter and Dropper please! NOT BANKER,, WITH RANDOMS PLEASE

item.title: [request]Willow Cutter and Dropper
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“the nerd, post:6, topic:47843”][quote]
Considering you posted your script yesterday(March) and 93dcthugs93 posted his in january, the fact that 93dcthugs93 is a sectional moderator, has a java coder cup, and was a member of the original AutoRune Crew, I doubt dcthugs stole the script, and instead I think you are the one that stole it. I will post proof at SRL forums, too.
[/quote]

I would like to point out to the un-named that I hold all of the script versions, including some of the unreleased ones. I was only just notified of the script a few days ago. If you need me to go to the extent of posting all script version, and gaining the confirmation that I was the original author from SRL-Dev’s or SRL members then i will be happy to, along as the stolen copy of my work is removed and replace by the original. I have already asked for advise from respected SRL-member about this issue.

Please also visit the following page as evidence.
http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/power-wood-chopper-t5244.html

I think you will find the above link shows that I am the original author.[/quote]

Sorry. I’m too quick to make assumptions.

I’m not sure what to think but it’s almost certain nothing will be done about it. I’ve deleted my thread at SRL-Member sections and here, too.

Read full topic

item.title: [request]Willow Cutter and Dropper
item.dc:creator: @the_nerd the nerd
item.description:
@the_nerd wrote:

Considering you posted your script yesterday(March) and 93dcthugs93 posted his in january, the fact that 93dcthugs93 is a sectional moderator, has a java coder cup, and was a member of the original AutoRune Crew, I doubt dcthugs stole the script, and instead I think you are the one that stole it. I will post proof at SRL forums, too.

I would like to point out to the un-named that I hold all of the script versions, including some of the unreleased ones. I was only just notified of the script a few days ago. If you need me to go to the extent of posting all script version, and gaining the confirmation that I was the original author from SRL-Dev’s or SRL members then i will be happy to, along as the stolen copy of my work is removed and replace by the original. I have already asked for advise from respected SRL-member about this issue.

Please also visit the following page as evidence.
http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/power-wood-chopper-t5244.html

I think you will find the above link shows that I am the original author.

Read full topic

@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“the nerd, post:4, topic:47843”]I would like to point out that the above script is my work that has been stolen. You can find the latest work at
http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/working-power-chopper-t5590.html
i took me over two weeks to perfect that script!!! I don’t like the idea of it being stolen!!![/quote]

Considering you posted your script yesterday(March) and 93dcthugs93 posted his in january, the fact that 93dcthugs93 is a sectional moderator, has a java coder cup, and was a member of the original AutoRune Crew, I doubt dcthugs stole the script, and instead I think you are the one that stole it. I will post proof at SRL forums, too.

item.title: [request]Willow Cutter and Dropper
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Lawl!

[code]program PowerTreeCutter;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\woodcutting.scar}

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Power Wood Cutter //
// By 93dcthugs93 //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //
// No good item incase of death. //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//
// You don’t need to change the Tree colors, unless //
// The Tree you want to cut is not green //
//
treecolor1=3041376;// First Tree Color. //
//
treecolor2=1728592;// Second Tree Color. //
//
treecolor3=2246712;// Third Tree Color. //
//
whattree=‘Tree’; // The type of tree you want to cut//
//
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//
runaway=‘N’; // The direction you want to run if//
// you get a random event. //
//
timebeforelogout=30;// Time in minutes before log in //
// next user. //
//
randomtime=10; // Random logout time in minutes. //
//
//
maxlogin=0; // The maximum number of times to //
// login untill the Script //
// terminates. Set to 0 if you //
// want the script to terminate //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

///////////////// Don’t Touch ////////////////////////
procedure DeclarePlayers; //
begin //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Player Setup //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

HowManyPlayers := 6; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 1; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := ‘’; //Your Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘’; //Your Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘’; //3 or 4 letters from your Username (NOT the first letter of your user name!!!)
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := ‘Attack’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True; //Set true if there is a player entered

Players[1].Name := ‘’; //Your Username
Players[1].Pass := ‘’; //Your Password
Players[1].Nick := ‘’; //3 or 4 letters from your Username (NOT the first letter of your user name!!!)
Players[1].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[1].Skill := ‘Attack’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[1].Active := True; //Set true if there is a player entered

Players[2].Name := ‘’; //Your Username
Players[2].Pass := ‘’; //Your Password
Players[2].Nick := ‘’; //3 or 4 letters from your Username (NOT the first letter of your user name!!!)
Players[2].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[2].Skill := ‘Attack’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[2].Active := True; //Set true if there is a player entered

Players[3].Name := ‘’; //Your Username
Players[3].Pass := ‘’; //Your Password
Players[3].Nick := ‘’; //3 or 4 letters from your Username (NOT the first letter of your user name!!!)
Players[3].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[3].Skill := ‘Attack’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[3].Active := false; //Set true if there is a player entered

Players[4].Name := ‘’; //Your Username
Players[4].Pass := ‘’; //Your Password
Players[4].Nick := ‘’; //3 or 4 letters from your Username (NOT the first letter of your user name!!!)
Players[4].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[4].Skill := ‘Attack’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[4].Active := false; //Set true if there is a player entered

Players[5].Name := ‘’; //Your Username
Players[5].Pass := ‘’; //Your Password
Players[5].Nick := ‘’; //3 or 4 letters from your Username (NOT the first letter of your user name!!!)
Players[5].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[5].Skill := ‘Attack’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[5].Active := True; //Set true if there is a player entered

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Please Don’t Touch Anything Below Here Unless You //
// Know What You Are Doing //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
end;

var
randomlogouttime:integer;
MHours, MMinutes, MSeconds, TS: LongInt;
timerunningsofar:string;
gainedXP,exp:integer;
loginsofar,PlayerReport,FalsePlayers,User:integer;
setupstart:integer;
dir,times:integer;

procedure TimeRunning2;
begin
MSeconds := (GetSystemTime - TS) div 1000;
MMinutes := MSeconds div 60;
MHours := MMinutes div 60;
end;

function TimeRunning1: string;
var
RHours, TMinutes, TSeconds, RMinutes, RSeconds: LongInt;
Time: string;
begin
TSeconds := (GetSystemTime - ST) div 1000;
TMinutes := TSeconds div 60;
RHours := TMinutes div 60;
Time := inttostr(TSeconds) + ’ Seconds’;
if TMinutes <> 0 then
begin
RSeconds := TSeconds mod (TMinutes * 60);
Time := inttostr(TMinutes) + ’ Minutes and ’ + inttostr(RSeconds) + ’ Seconds’;
end;
if RHours <> 0 then
begin
RMinutes := TMinutes mod (RHours * 60);
RSeconds := TSeconds mod (TMinutes * 60);
Time := inttostr(RHours) + ’ Hours, ’ + inttostr(RMinutes) +
’ Minutes and ’ + inttostr(RSeconds) + ’ Seconds’;
end;
Result := Time;
end;

procedure checksettings;
begin
gametab(11)
begin
if not (getcolor(712,226)=16777215)then
mouse (714,229,2,2,true);
end;
begin
if not (getcolor(613,263)=16777215)then
mouse (615,266,2,2,true);
end;
begin
if not (getcolor(613,299)=16777215)then
mouse (614,301,2,2,true);
end;
begin
if not (getcolor(613,336)=16777215)then
mouse (612,337,2,2,true);
end;

end;

Procedure CheckAxeHeadColor;
begin
if not (FindAxeHeadColor) then
begin
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(Players[CurrentPlayer].Name + ’ Does not have an axe’)
Writeln(‘Changing Players’)
Writeln(’’)
logout;
Players[CurrentPlayer].Active := False
nextplayer(true)
highestangle;
checksettings;
CheckAxeHeadColor;
TS :=getsystemtime;
end;
end;

procedure endofusercheck;
begin
if (maxlogin > 0) then
begin
if (loginsofar > maxlogin) then
begin
logout;
terminatescript;
end;
end;
User := 0
FalsePlayers := 0
Repeat
If not (Players[User].Active) then
begin
FalsePlayers := FalsePlayers + 1
end;
User := User +1
Until (User >= HowManyPlayers - 1)

TimeRunning2;
if (not(LoggedIn)) and
not (FalsePlayers = HowManyPlayers - 1) then
begin
Times := 0
nextplayer(true)
highestangle;
checksettings;
CheckAxeHeadColor;
TS :=getsystemtime;
end;
randomlogouttime:= timebeforelogout + (random(randomtime))
if (randomlogouttime <= Mminutes)and
not (FalsePlayers = HowManyPlayers - 1) then
begin
logout;
Times := 0;
loginsofar := loginsofar + 1
NextPlayer(true)
HighestAngle;
SolveFrogSwamp;
checksettings;
CheckAxeHeadColor;
TS :=getsystemtime;
end;
end;

procedure customsrl;
begin
MouseSpeed:= 10;
Screenshots:=true;
CheckHpFirst:=false;
ReinCarnate:=false;
end;

procedure startmesage;
begin
writeln (’’)
writeln (’/////////////// Thank You for using 93dcthugs93’s \\\\\\\\\\\’)
writeln (’////////////////////// POWER CUTTER \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’)
writeln (’’)
wait(2000+random(1000))
end;

procedure checkiflogged;
begin
if (loggedin) then
begin
checksettings;
HighestAngle;
SolveFrogSwamp;
CheckAxeHeadColor;
makecompass(‘N’);
TS := getsystemtime;
end;
end;

procedure Setup;
begin
MarkTime( SetupStart )
cleardebug;
setupsrl;
disguiseSCAR(‘Winamp’)
DeclarePlayers;
TS :=getsystemtime;
customsrl;
writeln (‘Setup Completed in ’ + inttostr(( ST - SetupStart )) + ’ msec’)
startmesage;
activateclient;
checkiflogged;
endofusercheck;
end;

procedure runawayfrom;
begin
RunAwayDirection(runaway)
flag;
wait (1000+random(1000))
runback;
flag;
end;

procedure checkfight;
begin
if (findfight) then
runawayfrom;
end;

procedure randoms;
begin
SolveFrogSwamp;
checkfight;
FindNormalRandoms;
Findtalk
if (WeAreDead) then
begin
logout;
end;
if (FindScapeRune) then
begin
logout;
Players[CurrentPlayer].active := false
end;
FindMod;
antiban;
end;

procedure checkifcut;
var
dir:integer;
begin
if (InChatMulti(‘Wood’,‘You’,‘need’)) then
begin
dir:= random(3) + 1

case dir of
  1:mouse(234,299,20,2,true)
  2:mouse(30,154,20,2,true)
  3:mouse(232,16,20,2,true)
  4:mouse(487,117,20,2,true)
end;
flag;

end;
end;

Function CheckIfBroken:boolean;
begin
if (EquipAxe) then
begin
GameTab(5)
wait(200 + random(200));
MMouse(592, 297, 2, 2);
wait(200 + random(100));
Result := IsUptext(‘Remove brok’)
end;
If not (EquipAxe) then
begin
wait(100 + random(200));
if ( ExistsItem ( 1 )) then
begin
Mmouse(587, 219, 2, 2)
wait(200 + random(100))
Result := IsUptext(‘Use Brok’)
end else
begin
Result := False;
end;
end;
end;

procedure checkaxe;
begin
if (FindNpcChatText(‘You do not’)) or
(FindNpcChatText(‘You need an’))then

begin

if not (CheckIfBroken) then

begin

if (FindHead) then
begin
if (EquipAxe) then
begin
ClickItemColorTol(Head,10,true)
end;
if Not (EquipAxe) then
begin
findcolortolerance(x,y,Head,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,10);
MMouse(x,y,3,3);
getmousepos(x,y);
HoldMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(100 + Random(100));
MMouse(583,224,3,3);
getmousepos(x,y);
Wait(100 + Random(100));
ReleaseMouse(x,y,true);
end;
end;
end;
end;
end;

procedure cuttdowntree;
begin
wait (1000+random(1000))
findent(treecolor1);
findent(treecolor2);
findent(treecolor3);

if (FindObjMulti(‘Chop’,treecolor1,treecolor2,treecolor3,10))then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y)
mouse (x,y,2,3,true);
flag;
times := 0;
end else
begin
if (times >= 6) then
begin
Times := 0
Writeln (players[currentplayer].Name)
writeln (‘Can’‘t find tree changing player’)
players[currentplayer].Active := false;
nextplayer(true);
checksettings;
HighestAngle;
SolveFrogSwamp;
CheckAxeHeadColor;
TS := getsystemtime;
end;
times:=times + 1
dir := dir + 1
if (dir >= 5) then
dir:=1;
case dir of
1: MakeCompass(‘E’);
2: MakeCompass(‘S’);
3: MakeCompass(‘W’);
4: MakeCompass(‘N’);
end;
end;
findent(treecolor1);
findent(treecolor2);
findent(treecolor3);
checkifcut;
if not (findhead) then
begin
Writeln (Players[CurrentPlayer].Name + ’ has lost their Axe Head’)
Writeln (‘Changing Player’)
status (‘Changing Player’)
Players[CurrentPlayer].Active := False
Logout;
NextPlayer(True);
end;
//checkaxe; // POST findhead procudures, still needs work.
randoms;
end;

procedure DropAllLogs1;
var
rx, ry, m, n : Integer;
begin
Status(‘Dropping Logs’);
Gametab(4)
begin
for M:=1 to 7 do
begin
for n:=1 to 4 do
begin
rx := 544 + (n * 42)
ry := 192 + (m * 36)
mmouse(rx, ry, 0, 0)
wait(100 + random(100));
if (IsUpText(‘Wi’)) or
(IsUpText(‘Sea’)) or
(IsUpText(‘Use K’)) or
(IsUpText(‘Use C’)) or
(IsUpText(‘Use T’)) then
begin
Chopped := Chopped - 1;
end else
begin
getmousepos(x, y)
mouse(x, y, 5, 5, false);
wait(100 + random(50));
if(ClickText(‘Drop’, MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2))then

             wait(150 + random(210));
             end;
    end;
  end;
end;

end;

procedure droplogs;
begin
if (inventorycount=28) then
begin
chopped:= chopped + 28
DropAllLogs1;
end;
end;

procedure getexp;
var
TreeToCut:string;
begin
TreeToCut := lowercase(whattree)
if (TreeToCut = ‘tree’) then
begin
EXP := 25;
end;
if (TreeToCut = ‘oak’) then
begin
EXP := 37;
end;
if (TreeToCut = ‘willow’) then
begin
EXP := 62;
end;
if (TreeToCut = ‘teak’) then
begin
EXP := 100;
end;
if (TreeToCut = ‘mahogany’) then
begin
EXP := 125;
end;
if (TreeToCut = ‘yew’) then
begin
EXP := 175;
end;
if (TreeToCut = ‘magic’) then
begin
EXP := 250;
end;
end;

procedure report;
begin
PlayerReport := PlayerReport + 1
timerunningsofar:= timerunning1;
gainedXP:= Chopped * EXP;
writeln (’/////////////// Progress Report //////////////////////////////////////’)
writeln (’’)
writeln (’ Time running so far: ’ + timerunningsofar )
writeln (’ Randoms:’)
writeln (’ Runaway ’ + inttostr(Fights) + ’ time[s]’)
writeln (’ Solved lamps ’ + inttostr(lamps) + ’ time[s]’)
writeln (’ Talked to randoms ’ + inttostr(talks) + ’ time[s]’)
writeln (’ Players Died ’ + inttostr(Deaths) + ’ time[s]’)
writeln (’ Solved Sandwich Lady’ + inttostr(Sandwiches) + ’ time[s]’)
writeln (’ Frog Solved ’ + inttostr(frogs) + ’ time[s]’)
writeln (’’)
writeln (’ Found and attached axe head ’ + inttostr(AxeAttaches) + ’ time[s]’)
writeln (’ Ent avoided ’ + inttostr(EntsAvoided) + ’ times[s]’)
writeln (’’)
writeln (’’)
writeln (’ Loged in ’ + inttostr (loginsofar) + ’ Time[s]’)
writeln (’’)
writeln (’ Managed to gain about ’ + inttostr(gainedxp) + ’ Woodcutting EXP’)
writeln (’’)
writeln (’//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////’)
Writeln (’’)
if (PlayerReport >= 10) then
begin
User := 0
repeat
Writeln (Players[user].Name)
Writeln (‘Active = ’ + boolToStr(Players[User].Active))
writeln (’-------------------------------’)
User := User + 1
until (User = HowManyPlayers - 1)
Writeln (’//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////’)
PlayerReport := 0
end;
end;

begin
setup;
getexp;
repeat
cuttdowntree;
droplogs;
report;
antiban;
endofusercheck;
until (FalsePlayers >= HowManyPlayers - 1)
User := 0
repeat
Writeln (Players[user].Name)
Writeln (‘Active = ’ + boolToStr(Players[User].Active))
writeln (’-------------------------------’)
User := User + 1
until (User = HowManyPlayers - 1)
Writeln (’’)
Writeln (‘Run out of Active Players’)
Writeln (‘End of Script’)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
